text:
@SpeakerPelosi There are 10 TIMES MORE DEATHS from HEART DISEASE than COVID in CA

COVID deaths are 0.02% of CA population - mostly fragile/compromised in nursing homes.

WHAT HONEST PERSON would claim deaths of ZERO% of pop is a pandemic?
MASK LAW=POLITICAL FRAUD

#Masks4All #mask #coronavirus
